Name: Aloft Mantle
LongDescription: Boosts maximum PP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Dratini, Dragonair, and Dragonite.  Finding an Aloft Mantle at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
